ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] New to group
ygData.msgSnippet: Welcome to the group! No toons on the Rathe, and I recently started up on the new server, Stromm. Kinda weird, seeing all the newbie zones full (112 in
ygData.messageBody:
Welcome to the group! No toons on the Rathe, and I
recently started up on the new server, Stromm. Kinda
weird, seeing all the newbie zones full (112 in
Nektulos last night) and people actually making and
buying tattered armor. :) It's really fun.

--- Randy <morat68@...> wrote:
> I wanted to post real quick and say hello. I've been
> playing EQ for
> about 2 1/2 years now. I play on the Rathe server,
> if anyone needs
> anything feel free to ask. My toons are as follows:
> Taladinos - 50 war (semi retired)
> Fariel - 51 wiz
> Morrog - 26 necro
> Wahupta - 20 ranger
> Glorfindol - 16 pally
> Khaoslord - 12 mage
> Lyzzarddo - 11 monk
> Hughmun - 10 shammy
> The guild I belong to is called "Cries on Havoc"
> I'm also curious if anyone lives around St. Louis,
> Mo.
>
>
>
>


=====
Never confuse your right to do something
with the right thing to do.
